title: Emmys 2015: Julia Louis-Dreyfus Wins Outstanding Lead Actress in a Comedy Series
content:
By @lydsprice 
09/20/2015 AT 09:15 PM EDT 
 You can thank Julia Louis-Dreyfus for the laughs. 
The star won the 2015 Primetime Emmy Award for outstanding lead actress in a comedy series for her portrayal of Selina Meyer on . 

"I think it would be appropriate at this moment to quote our poetical satire ," Louis-Dreyfus said during her acceptance speech. "What a great honor it must be for you to honor me tonight" 

She quickly quipped, "Oh God, no! Donald Trump said that," adding, "It's getting trickier and trickier to satirize this stuff." 
 
Julia Louis-Dreyfus 
 
Danny Moloshok / Invision for the Television Academy / AP 
  The  star beat out an incredibly talented group of nominees, including Lily Tomlin for , Edie Falco for , Lisa Kudrow for , Amy Schumer for  and Amy Poehler for . 
Seth Meyers presented the award at the Microsoft Theater in Los Angeles. 
RELATED VIDEO: Melissa Fumero on Emmy Host Andy Samberg: 'If Anything Unplanned Happens, He's Just Going to Go with It and Make It Funny'  
Fox aired the 2015 Emmy Awards, hosted by Andy Samberg, live on Sept. 20.  For more detail please click here
